welcome_header.white_text: Create your shift schedule & hire your

section_one.welcome_paragraph: JobCore is a scheduling, hiring and payment marketplace for the hospitality industry: a validated and curated talent pool of workers and hundreds of companies organizing eventes and hiring every day.

section_two.section_two_paragraph: JobCore is a platform focused on the hospitality industry that connects carterers, single location full service restaurants, nightclubs, bars and janitorial services companies to qualified part-time workers.
section_two.section_two_paragraph2: Employers create their calendar shifts, recruit workers from our curated pool, communicate with them, and schedule, pay, and rate them quickly and efficiently.

image_cards.text: Setup your job and preferences in a custom calendar.
Access a talent pool of people in Miami, rated with experience.
Automatically send employees job location and shift times.
Track employee performance with GPS located clock in-out features.
Instant payroll reports based on employee activity.
Direct ACH payments to employee bank accounts

section_header.black_text: Finally a job marketplace for the

section_three.section_phrase: Finding talent and jobs in the hospitality industry has never been easier.
section_three.section_phrase2: Sign up today and give it a try!

list: Publish shifts to hundreds of curated talents
Talent clocks-in / out using our app
Everything employers need in one platform!

section_five_header.black_text: Job seekers can find jobs in minutes and

list: Setup your location, profile and preferences
Start receiving invites to work on shifts based on your preferences

section_six.section_six_paragraph: Sign up today and experience the difference. It's fast and easy!

section_seven.section_seven_paragraph: JobCore provides an easy to use end-to-end experience for employers and job seekers in the hospitality industry on mobile and desktop.

section_nine.welcome_paragraph: Sign up today and experience the difference. It's fast and easy!
